comments.body: Does this need to be the same as MaxAge in client/metrics/metrics.go?  I assume so, in which case you need a shared constant, to prevent them from getting out of sync is someone changes one and not the other.
Similar argument for the rest of this structure.  Why are the two help strings slightly different?  That's an example of the general case I mention above.
There is no requirement for these to be the same. Although it's probably more intuitive to have the equal in all places.
